body.name: Novilla Metal Platform Bed Frame, Wood Slat Support, No Box Spring Needed, Easy Assembly, White, Queen
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 33 mins
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 48 mins
features: Durable & Safe - The Novilla bed frame comes with a metal frame for structural stability without wobbling and shaking, plus our selection of high-quality P2 grade slats that meet strict formaldehyde emission standards, giving you peace of mind when it comes to safety, suitable for all families.

Size & Weight Capacity - There is a 12in clearance underneath, you'll have plenty of space to store your daily essentials and keep things neat. Plus, the central leg provides extra stability and can support up to 700lbs of weight.

Easy to Assemble - Our product comes along with necessary accessories and an instruction manual, which are delivered to your doorstep in a box. Follow the detailed instructions and make assembly a breeze.

Anti-Noise & Anti-Scratch - Novilla bed frame employs Velcro to connect the slats and metal frame, resulting in a quieter experience and easier installation. Additionally, anti-scratch pads are paired with the bed legs to carefully protect your floor.

Classical Design - Novilla bed frame comes in two styles: a basic model without a headboard and another that features a headboard with a supportable backrest. Both options are designed to blend seamlessly with any decor, making them a perfect choice for any home.
body.description: The Novilla metal bed frame is simple and stylish in design. Metal frame structure with wooden slats for support. To top it off, the metal legs in the middle add extra reinforcement, ensuring that the structure is stable and won't wobble or shake. We provide detailed installation instructions and all necessary components. Our instructions are easy to follow and can be quickly assembled by anyone. We have four sizes to fit your need, namely Twin/Full/Queen/King, and black and white colors available for you to choose from.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The installation is very easy , the design is simple and generous, very thick, and there is no odor. It’s very sturdy.It’s valuable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I rec'd the king size bed frame with headboard to go along with my Novilla mattress which I had bought a few months ago. Needless to say, they both fit like a hand & glove. There is absolutely no noise with the wood slats supporting the mattress and it's particularly nice to not have to add a box spring. The comfort is certainly the main feature here and my mattress ensures that. The bed frame is very sturdy and has plenty of room to store odds/ends under the 12" clearance. I don't normally want things stored under my bed but it's still nice to know that it's there if you need it for storage. The frame looks especially rich in color and style. It dresses up the bed and looks so nice in the overall scheme. I am so happy with the purchase and will definitely recommend the bed frame...and yes...the mattress as well, to all my friends and family. I'm still excited to showcase the fine details that I believe add to the beauty of the frame. The price is right and the product came in 2 days earlier than expected with no problems putting it all together. Good instructions are necessary and this was no exception. Thank you Novilla for the quality of your product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy bed frame, classic look.
reviews.reviewText: The bed frame is super sturdy once properly assembled, the central leg also gives more balance and stability.It comes with well-packed necessary accessories and tools, they look very simple and not complicated at all compared to other bed frames I've bought.It can be easily assembled with the included tools by following the assembly instructions and everything is clearly labeled. Also, if you have an electric screwdriver, will save you time and effort.The wooden slats are very sturdy too, and they sit on the frame snugly. I just put the mattress directly on the wooden slats with no problems.Overall, this is a nice affordable bed frame with a classic look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame was exactly what we needed- it’s super easy to put together (two adults in a total of 30 mins), sturdy, and as advertised. Only complaints are the big scuff into the metal on the headboard and that the support planks are a littler thinner than I’d prefer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The installation is very simple, the physical design is simple and generous, very thick, and there is no odor. I have used it for two days, and there is no abnormal noise. I am very satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Easy assembly
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 16-year-old daughter because her old wood bedframe broke. She picked this out and I am very grateful that she picked out a very good product. The price is good and affordable. She actually put the product together herself and did a great job. She said that the instructions were very easy and it came with everything she needed. Thank you for providing, a reliable and good quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly and sturdy product
reviews.reviewText: Frame is very sturdy and nice. Fairly easy to put together as well. There’s plenty of space “height” under the bed for storage. The storage on top is also apparently perfect for cats to nap- bonus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price
reviews.reviewText: This is actually a very good bed frame. It is sturdy and honestly, it looks beautiful. The instructions are very easy to follow. Highly recommended.
